task: Develop a basic 'Dig Dug' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Is there something missing?'.
name: Burrow Quest

branding_data.short_description: Burrow Quest is a modern twist on the classic 'Dig Dug' game, challenging players to explore and unearth hidden treasures while facing unexpected obstacles.
branding_data.detailed_description: Burrow Quest takes the core mechanics of the classic 'Dig Dug' game and adds a fresh layer of complexity and intrigue. Players dig through various terrains to defeat underground creatures and uncover hidden treasures. However, the game introduces the oblique strategy 'Is there something missing?', leading players to discover mysterious voids and puzzles within the earth. These voids contain secret chambers and artifacts that are essential for progression, adding an element of exploration and strategy. Players must navigate through these challenges to complete their quest, balancing between defeating enemies and solving intricate puzzles to reveal the full story behind the underground world.
